home.homeIntroduction: A collectibles project for extreme sports enthusiasts, with dog as the main character, contains eight extreme sports as design elements of NFT. a variety of extreme sports scenes, colors, characteristics, the total collection of 30,000. through the pledge of NFT to obtain dog food to participate in community activities and construction.

header.inviterTip: Please enter the your referee’s address to continue.

mint.mintIntroduction: Minting Eternal Doges needs ETH and Pass. Use advanced pass to get rare NFTs.

auction.auctionIntroduction: The Eternal doge club auction has started and will end on May 3, 2022 at 12:00 PM. Bidders can bid as much ETH as they want in their initial bid, and have the option to increase their bid. The amount of NFT for sale and the duration of the auction are fixed. At the end of the auction, the liquidation price will be determined and successful bidders who bid above the liquidation price will receive NFT and a refund of any ETH balance remained. Unsuccessful bids below the liquidation price will receive a full refund. Share Eternal Doge Club with your friends to mint and get a fascinating ETH bonus.

pledge.withdrawTip: A certain percentage of withdrawals may be burned, please confirm before continue.

lottery.explain1: 1. You can use dog treat or EDDC to draw, and each draw consumes 100 dog treat or 100 EDDC.
lottery.explain2: 2. The result of the draw is chosen randomly, the draw reward will be issued to your draw account immediately, you need to collect it manually to your balance account.
lottery.explain3: 3. The probability of dog treat draw is as follows:
lottery.explain3_1: a) 30% probability of drawing EDDC worth 0.9U.
lottery.explain3_2: b) 20% probability of drawing 1.5U worth of EDDC.
lottery.explain3_3: c) 10% chance of winning 2U worth of EDDC.
lottery.explain4: 4. The probability of winning an EDDC is as follows:
lottery.explain4_1: a) 30% chance of winning 80 EDDC worth of ETH.
lottery.explain4_2: b) 19.7% chance of winning 100 EDDC worth of ETH.
lottery.explain4_3: c) 0.3% chance of winning a Pass Card Premium.
lottery.explain4_4: d) 50% chance of not winning the lottery.
lottery.explain5: 5. 50% of the dog treat consumed by non-users will be awarded to the user with the highest ranking of invitation contribution.

market.description: PASS card is a mandatory material to mint Eternal Doge NFTs. You may mint rare NFTs by using the advanced pass, rare NFTs will be distributed randomly after Mint.

faq.explain1_1: PPA is a Web3 brand born in the bear market of 2022.
faq.explain1_2: Everyone is facing different pressures in today's society, car loans, mortgages, idiot employers, working overtime, and losing money in the crypto market... Everyone is looking forward to a better future in reality and in the Web3 world, but how many people have lost money in the Black Swan in 2022? PPA also maintains a vision of a better life, but we hope that everyone can vent their frustrations in the Web3 world! Fuck rug! Fuck bear market! Fuck FOMO! PAA is a Web3 community that brings together all those who are under pressure. We believe you will find yourself in the PPA NFTs.
faq.explain1_3: By the way, if you are stressfree, then sorry, this community is not for you.
faq.explain2_1: We want to build a utopian Web3 community, where everyone doesn't have to pretend. Please vent your inner pressure, pour out all your worries and anger, and try your best to live the trueself! We don't want you to wear masks here and pretend that you are fine! We can all vent together, and solve each other's problems, to build a chill and supportive community. Piggy's shelter is here for you!
faq.explain3_1: Pressure Pig Association is a PFP project on Ethereum with a total of 9,999 and a launch date of March-April 2023. More than one hundred different traits. Creator earnings at 5%.
faq.explain4: 4. How many times can I mint PPA with the same wallet address?
faq.explain4_1: You can mint max to three PPA NFTs with the same wallet address.
faq.explain5: 5. Which Blockchain will PPA mint on?
faq.explain8_1: The team has been working on the PPA project for nearly 1 year. We developed nearly 130 individual hand-drawn traits.
faq.explain9: 9. How can I reach out to the PPA team?
faq.explain9_1: You can email us at team@ppa-nft.xyz or Discord and Twitter.
faq.explain10: 10. Is PPA open to whitelist collaborations?
faq.explain10_1: Yes we do. Please contact us on the collaboration channel on discord.
faq.explain11: 11. How do I stay updated and safe?
faq.explain11_1: All updates for PPA will be made through the official PPA Twitter and Discord. There will never be a “surprise mint” or sudden instance where we will ask you to connect your wallet or send us any of your NFTs.
faq.explain11_2: There are many steps you can take to protect yourself in the crypto and NFT space, at the bare minimum we highly recommend you use a Ledger or other cold wallet to store your assets.
faq.explain11_3: Also, the majority of attacks we see on crypto users come in the form of social manipulation. Know that we will never contact you directly or act as a middle-man in a trade. If something sounds too good to be true, or requires urgent action so you don’t miss something, it is likely someone is trying to take advantage of you.
